    • Method Detail

      • getConversations

        public java.util.List<Conversation> getConversations()
                                              throws BaringoApiException
        Returns the list of conversations in which the currently-authenticated user took part (all of them).

        NOTE: the getMessages() method will not return the messages for the conversation in this call; If you want all of that content, see @see #getConversationMessage .

        Here we have another situation where, instead of returning an empty list when there are no conversations to list, the Imgur API is returning false. Which of course breaks everything.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Returns:
        list of Conversation objects.
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - Imgur crashed

      • getConversationWithMessages

        public Conversation getConversationWithMessages(long conversationId,
                                                int page)
                                         throws BaringoApiException
        Given a specific conversation id, return its information as well as the messages in it. Messages are paged 25 at a time. The currently-authenticated user must be one of the participants in the conversation.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        conversationId - numeric id of the conversation, probably derived from getConversations()
        page - the page number STARTING AT 1 and not 0 like everything else around here.
        Returns:
        Conversation with a list of messages
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - argh

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String toUserName,
                           java.lang.String body)
                    throws BaringoApiException
        Send a message to another user. New messages automatically become part of the overall "conversation" with another user, basically like text messaging.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        toUserName - userName of the user to send to
        body - the body of the message.
        Returns:
        the resulting Message object
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - ouch

      • deleteConversation

        public boolean deleteConversation(long conversationId)
                           throws BaringoApiException
        Given a conversation id, delete it and all messages inside it.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        conversationId - id of the conversation to delete
        Returns:
        true if success
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - indicator of not-success

      • reportSender

        public boolean reportSender(java.lang.String userName)
                     throws BaringoApiException
        Given a userName, report that user for sending messages that violate the Imgur Terms of Service. See Imgur terms of service

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        userName - name of the user to report
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - unsuccessful

      • blockSender

        public boolean blockSender(java.lang.String userName)
                    throws BaringoApiException
        Given a userName, permanently block that user from sending messages (actually it can be undone in the UI).

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        userName - name of the user to block
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - unsuccessful
